name: Neoman Project Template Template (NPTT)
description: A template used by Neoman, itself, to turn other projects into project templates.
author: OSS, Plz.

options.#: This template initializes projects, some of which may be non-empty.

#: Provides a way of interacting with the user.

define.name: What is a good display name for your template project?
define.author: Who is the author?
define.language: What is the main language of your project template?
define.glob: What glob identifies your source files (e.g, **/*.js, **/*.cs)?
